title: When are the RBSE 12th exam 2020 date and time table coming? - Quora

response.answer_text: RBSE 12th Exam Date 2020 Time Table (Released) for all stream commerce, science, and arts. RBSE (Rajasthan Board Of Secondary Education) board is an agency of the Government of Rajasthan. Its headquarter is in the Ajmer city of the state board is responsible to conduct board exams in Rajasthan. RBSE is set in 1957.  Students are eagerly waiting for the RBSE 12th Exam Date 2020 now finally their wait for exam dates is over. Because of the epidemic, the COVID-19 exam gets delayed. RBSE conducts the 12th board exam annually. RBSE 12th Exam Date 2020 New Released Dates: RBSE 12th exam date 2020 for remaining exams has been released. Check the complete schedule from the table below. Subject Name - Exam Date Maths	18 Jun 2020IT & Programming	19 Jun 2020Geography	22 Jun 2020Home Science	23 Jun 2020Drawing	24 Jun 2020Language Papers	25 Jun 2020RBSE 12th Exam Date 2020 for some exams postponed due to COVID -19 pandemic is going to be conducted from 18 Jun to 25 Jun 2020. All the best Students……
